title: The adventures of Covent-Garden in imitation of Scarron's City romance.
author: Farquhar, George, 1677?-1707.
publisher: Printed by H. Hills, for R. Standfast ...
notes: "Though published anonymously, there is every reason to attribute this work to Farquhar's hand."--The complete works of George Farquhar, ed. by Charles Stonehill. [London] 1930, v. 1, p. xvi.
Reproduction of original in William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
